content: this is a pattern for crochet only designed to help you make your very own wonder the birthday dragon all patterns are written in english in us terms using craft yarn council abbreviations need a gift for a special birthday boy or girl something adorable but totally unique wonder the birthday dragon is the perfect gift just imagine their faces when they pull a big fluffy cupcake out of the gift box and on top is a sleepy adorable baby dragon who fell asleep before he could blow out his first candle wonder the birthday dragon pattern 2 0 is designed to be easy to read whether you are a confident beginner or an expert plushy artist this pattern comes equipped with everything you need to succeed when you are finished with your project you will have learned new and useful skills for your art form and created a beautiful piece to cherish updated premium patterns now include checkboxes to keep you on track and organized color coding when needed and helpful tutorial photos right where you need them and none where you don t confident you can do it without helpful photos or checkboxes this pattern is also available for free in a text-only format not downloadable at www
